Name: Veil Flash Hider1
Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Flash Hider
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 1

Recoil Stability: +15%
Recoil Smoothness: +15%

The Veil Flash Hider1 is an S1 flash hider from ArmaMod. Designed to reduce muzzle flash, it will help keep your position hidden once the action begins.
